sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import { BrowserRouter, Route, Routes } from 'react-router-dom'
import Navbar from './Navbar'
import Footer from './Footer'
import Home from './Home'

export default function App() {
  let [search, setSearch] = useState("")
  let [language, setlanguage] = useState("hi")

  function changeLanguage(data) {
    setlanguage(data)
  }
  function changeSearch(data) {
    setSearch(data)
  }
  return (
    <>
      <BrowserRouter>
        <Navbar changeLanguage={changeLanguage} changeSearch={changeSearch} />
        <Routes>
          <Route path='' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "All"} />} />
          <Route path='/All' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "All"} />} />
          <Route path='/Politics' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Politics"} />} />
          <Route path='/Science' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Science"} />} />
          <Route path='/Technology' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Technology"} />} />
          <Route path='/Education' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Education"} />} />
          <Route path='/Crime' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Crime"} />} />
          <Route path='/Entertainment' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Entertainment"} />} />
          <Route path='/Sports' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Sports"} />} />
          <Route path='/Cricket' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Cricket"} />} />
          <Route path='/Covid-19' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Covid-19"} />} />
          <Route path='/World' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "World"} />} />
          <Route path='/Cricket' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Cricket"} />} />
          <Route path='/Jokes' element={< Home language={state.language} q={state.search ? state.search : "Jokes"} />} />
        </Routes>
        <Footer />
      </BrowserRouter>
    </>
  )
}
